statements.query: MATCH (n:EC2SecurityGroup)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (n:IpRule)-[:MEMBER_OF_EC2_SECURITY_GROUP]->(:EC2SecurityGroup)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)

MATCH (n:IpRange)-[:MEMBER_OF_IP_RULE]->(:IpRule)-[:MEMBER_OF_EC2_SECURITY_GROUP]->(:EC2SecurityGroup)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:IpRule)-[r:MEMBER_OF_EC2_SECURITY_GROUP]->(:EC2SecurityGroup)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)

MATCH (:IpRange)-[r:MEMBER_OF_IP_RULE]->(:IpRule)-[:MEMBER_OF_EC2_SECURITY_GROUP]->(:EC2SecurityGroup)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
